content: loosen final stitch to see where needle should be placed repeat from * continue seaming working up to base of thumb then start at upper edge and seam down to crotch of thumb weave in ends gently soak in warm water with eucalan to soften your fabric roll in a towel and lay flat until dry for joan s demonstration of the mattress stitch used here go to www littleredmitten ca/classes notice that the yarn re-enters the same space/ hole where it exited from on the previous seam stitch joan janes ©2014-2019 joaninglisjanes@gmail com
